headline: Keysight Enables SK hynix to Achieve Top-Tier OCP S.A.F.E. Evaluation for Solid-State Drive Solution
summary: SANTA ROSA, Calif., October 21, 2025--Keysight Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: KEYS) has enabled SK hynix to earn its first Open Compute Project (OCP) Security Appraisal Framework and Enablement (S.A.F.E.) recognition for a solid-state drive (SSD) solution. This accomplishment represents a pioneering industry collaboration, underscoring Keysightâ€™s commitment to empowering innovators and securing the technology supply chain.
